title: Glenn Hubbard, The Wall and the Bridge: Fear and Opportunity in Disruption's Wake
description:
George W. Bush Council of Economic Advisers' chair Glenn Hubbard argues that government and business will need to invest more in American workers to offset job losses due to technology advances & globalization. He's interviewed by Harvard University economics professor and former International Monetary Fund chief economist Kenneth Rogoff.
